price: "Com efeito, confirmaste o sonho." Por certo, assim recompensamos os benfeitores.
arabic: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qad ṣaddaqta al-ru'yā innā kadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
